changePlans.question: Can I change plans anytime?
changePlans.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

exceedLimit.question: What happens if I exceed my appointment limit?
exceedLimit.answer: We'll notify you as you approach your limit. You can upgrade your plan or additional appointments are charged at €0.10 each.

annualDiscount.question: Do you offer annual discounts?
annualDiscount.answer: Yes! Save 20% when you pay annually. Contact our sales team for custom enterprise pricing.

setupFee.question: Is there a setup fee?
setupFee.answer: No setup fees, ever. You only pay the monthly subscription fee for your chosen plan.

freeTrial.question: What's included in the free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Full access to all Professional plan features for 30 days. No credit card required to start.

mapLoads.question: How do map loads work?
mapLoads.answer: Each time a customer views a map on your booking page counts as one load. Exceeded loads are charged at €0.01 each.
